title: Cannot connect to ANY game I have installed.
body: Every single game i have installed whenever i try to log in it gives me issues, not just league, i tried running as admin i tried turning off my vpn, i tried a fresh windows install i tried running the legacy client I tried reinstalling, nothing works.

replies.body: You may be having problems connecting specifically to the game server, so reinstalling or running as admin might not really help with that.  Instead I suggest going over the steps of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help resolve any network issues.  Let me know if you have any questions!
